import React from 'react'; import logo from './logo.svg'; import './App.css'; function App() { return (

Simple OKRs

Manage your team's OKRs

Achieve your goals with Simple OKR, a lightweight and free slack app for OKRs.

Hi! I'm Sean and I like to build things and solve complex problems.

I am a Product Manager at AirMap, where I work on UAS Traffic Management services to enable the future of drone operations.

Before this, I tried my own start up and failed. And before that, I studied computer science and was captain of the lacrosse team while at Harvard University.

I sometimes write about "Platform" Product Management from the eyes of a ~green~ PM, but I mainly learn from those who have been there. Check out some of my favorite resources, here.

You can also see some of my side projects on GitHub.

); } export default App;
